com.siperian.sif.message

Class TaskData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.TaskMetaData
      • com.siperian.sif.message.TaskData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class TaskData
extends TaskMetaData
implements Serializable
    Links to Hub data records (BO, PACKAGE, etc) associated with a task, plus a subject area, title, comment, and other task metadata.
    See Also:
    TaskMetaData, CreateTaskRequest, GetTasksResponse, UpdateTaskRequest, Serialized Form
